title: Topics in Business Analytics
description:
Business analytics, built on the prevalence of data, is being applied to all aspects of business to
enhance decision making. This module intends to expose students to recent developments in the
theory, technology and application of analytics in business. This module serves as a placeholder for
covering latest developments in business analytics (in theory, technology and/or applications) that are
not covered by other BA modules.

This module is also a placeholder for experimental or ad hoc elective modules in business analytics.
prerequisite:
DAO1704 Decision Analytics using Spreadsheets
DAO2702 Programming for Business Analytics
